div.p: Grupo 1 Mapeamento de Lifestyle Medicine Observation Codes to SNOMED CT (all versions)

tr.td: Water intake maps to broader SNOMED concept 'Fluid intake'. Target includes all fluids (water, juice, etc.), source is specific to water only. Code 226364002 should be verified via SNOMED CT Browser.
Caloric intake maps to SNOMED 'Dietary energy intake'. Code 226355004 should be verified via SNOMED CT Browser before clinical use.

No exact SNOMED CT code for macronutrients panel as of November 2025. SNOMED has individual codes for protein, carbohydrate, and fat intake but not a panel concept. Individual component mappings below.
Protein intake maps to SNOMED 'Dietary protein intake'. Code 226357007 should be verified via SNOMED CT Browser.
Fat intake maps to SNOMED 'Dietary fat intake'. Code 226358002 should be verified via SNOMED CT Browser.
Carbohydrate intake maps to SNOMED 'Dietary carbohydrate intake'. Code 226359005 should be verified via SNOMED CT Browser.

title.value: Nutrition Measurements to SNOMED CT Mapping

description.value: Operational ConceptMap for nutrition measurement terminology translation. Enables runtime $translate operations for semantic interoperability between consumer nutrition tracking applications and SNOMED CT standard terminology.

purpose.value: Provides semantic mappings from custom nutrition measurement codes to standard SNOMED CT codes. Consumer nutrition tracking uses proprietary measurements not fully covered by SNOMED CT. This ConceptMap enables clinical decision support systems to interpret consumer nutrition data using standardized terminology where available.

comment.value: Water intake maps to broader SNOMED concept 'Fluid intake'. Target includes all fluids (water, juice, etc.), source is specific to water only. Code 226364002 should be verified via SNOMED CT Browser.
Caloric intake maps to SNOMED 'Dietary energy intake'. Code 226355004 should be verified via SNOMED CT Browser before clinical use.

No exact SNOMED CT code for macronutrients panel as of November 2025. SNOMED has individual codes for protein, carbohydrate, and fat intake but not a panel concept. Individual component mappings below.
Protein intake maps to SNOMED 'Dietary protein intake'. Code 226357007 should be verified via SNOMED CT Browser.
Fat intake maps to SNOMED 'Dietary fat intake'. Code 226358002 should be verified via SNOMED CT Browser.
Carbohydrate intake maps to SNOMED 'Dietary carbohydrate intake'. Code 226359005 should be verified via SNOMED CT Browser.
